pages.text: In this release, SquirrelPAK AVP Almost Vanilla PLUS! is Vanilla Minecraft PLUS a barrel of squirrels. Well ok not really, but what it does have is mods that we here at SquirrelHQ think will be a good base for our upcoming 1.18.2 +Plus mod PAKs. We took our 'Almost Vanilla' PAK and gave it a good sprinkle of mods.!$(br)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/squirrelpak-avp)SquirrelPAK AVP Info$(/l)
